info.name: Primewire LetMeWatchThis dark reskin 2

info.additionalInfo: Ive done two other scripts for this site, one called Primewire LetMeWatchThis dark reskin, the other called Ultimate Primewire dark reskin and recommend trying that second one, its a major improvement
